infos.value: Well... Looks like Wezette isn't much to worry about either, eh?
Serjes... I think you already understand.
We may have been routed, but we still have what it takes to confront «Equito» as equals.
I want King Khury to hear those words directly from your mouth.
Naught will change. I do not think the king's intentions can be swayed.
Then you intend to continue this fight?
I am afraid that if you do, «Equito» will be—
Wh-why're you still acting like a puffed up cockatrice!?
They must have anticipated this from the very beginning...
This frozen tundra is our garden.
And it is also a white prison from which none may escape.
